titleStmt.title: SII 7.154: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 154. (A.R. No. 141 of 1900). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE IN THE TINTRINISVARA TEMPLE AT TINDIVANAM, TINDIVANAM TALUK, SAME DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . cālai kalamaṟutta kovirājarājakecaripanmaṟki yāṇṭu 10Āvatu Oymāṉāṭṭuk kiṭakkai
ñāṭṭuk kiṭaṅkil tiruttiṇṭīśvaradevarkku vīṇaivācippāṉukkum Uṭaṉpāṭuvā ṉoruvanukkuṅ
kiṭaṅkiṟ kaṭampūḻāṉ tīrtta nātittan muruṅkaippākkattil tirutti vaiytta nilam veppañceṟuviṉ teṟkiṟ kaṇṇāṟu varavai
Aiñcināṟ kuḻi Āyirattaiññūṟu kuḻiyum pāṭikāppānpaṭṭikkuk kiḻakkum vaṭakku maikkaraikkut teṟku Aṟunūṟu kuḻiyūm pūḷiyaṅko
llaiyil tirttaneṉṟu tiruttina ceṟu kuḻi Eṇṇūṟṟorupatu kuḻiyum Āka kuḻi Iraṇṭāyirattut toḷḷāyirattorupatu kuḻiyūm tirutti vīṇaivācippāṉuk
kum Uṭaṉpāṭuvā ṉoruvanukkum cantirātittavaṟ tirttaṉāccan tirutti vaittatu .
In this inscription the secondary isymbol has been wrongly used for i in many places.
Digital edition of SII 7.154 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
